name: experiments (window + 273)
description:
The first two games I ever made! They're bad!! They have cool ideas!!!

I don't want the only copy I have of these to be on my hard-drive any longer. These games are only barely games, but highlight my interest in limiting the amount of feedback that is given to players while still allowing them to have a great deal of control. Included in this zip:

  • window (2016) : an interactive fiction about a breakup
  • TwoHundredSeventyThree (2015) : interactive fiction inspired by 4’33”
